hero.title: Simplify your organization's management
hero.description: A comprehensive platform to manage your organization: Smart Dashboard, Planning & Availability, Stock Management, Mapping, Media, AI Assistance and personalized profiles. Everything you need to optimize your social actions.

memberManagement.title: Member management
memberManagement.description: Manage your team with manager/member roles, track detailed profiles and coordinate your volunteers efficiently.

dashboard.title: Smart Dashboard
dashboard.description: Complete overview of your organization with real-time statistics, charts and metrics to drive your actions.

stockManagement.title: Stock management
stockManagement.description: Track your inventories in real-time, manage inputs/outputs, receive alerts and optimize your resources.

planning.title: Planning & Availability
planning.description: Organize your events, manage member availability and coordinate your missions with interactive calendars.

map.title: Mapping & Routes
map.description: Visualize your intervention points on an interactive map, create optimized routes and track your field actions.

media.title: Media & Documents
media.description: Centralize your photos, documents and resources in an organized gallery with search and secure sharing.

ai.title: AI Assistance
ai.description: Benefit from intelligent assistance for your questions, advice and contextual help to optimize your actions.

profile.title: Personalized profiles
profile.description: Manage your personal information and that of your organization with detailed and editable profiles.
